amendment.description: To prohibit multichannel video programming distributors from being required to carry certain video content that is owned or controlled by the Government of the Russian Federation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1096 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5795-5796) To prohibit multichannel video programming distributors from being required to carry certain video content that is owned or controlled by the Government of the Russian Federation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1096 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1096 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Graham to Amendment SA 1003.
